marklogic.body: the last October 18 at 10 o\'clock or so , the 16-year-old youth Humou electric car ride home with Aunt Chen ,rolo ralph lauren, along Industrial Road to the Erqi Villas residential door motor vehicle lanes , it was late ,Chaussures Pas Cher, Humou not see the road conditions , light poles placed next to the motor vehicle road collision , Chen immediately fell from the car , head to the ground wounded collapsed , foaming at the mouth , Urinary incontinence. March 25 this year ,louboutin soldes, the Municipal Traffic Management Bureau riverbank brigade identified the Humou with the street lights Authority in this accident to bear equal responsibility , Chen does not assume any responsibility . before Chen in a hotel as manager, a post in a coma for more than 20 days wake up , after you wake up disoriented , can not remember exactly the injured process ,ralph lauren shop, the husband into his son , but also often Shouted: freedom, Identified , Chen mental disorders due to traumatic brain injury . on October 18 this year ,christian louboutin, the court ruled Chen civil capacity of people . Subsequently,ralph lauren, as the guardian of her husband , nephew and street lights Authority to court , he believes that the nephew of the Humou driving the non- motor vehicle traveling in the vehicle lane should bear 30% of the liability ; street lights Authority unauthorized road engaged in non- transport activities,Abercrombie Fitch, safety warning signs on construction sites is not set , should bear 70 percent responsibility , he asked the second defendant to compensate the wife of the total cost of 209,512.5 yuan . yesterday riverbank district court has been filed , will choose to hear the case . 相关的主题文章： Mercurial Vapor 中学生被老师打耳光后失踪 家长诉学 Chile twins one of whom died after separation surgery louboutin soldes Brothers elder brother for fishponds enemie
